title: Murderous Lewellyn’s Candlelit Dinner - Novel Updates

tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhwa   Clingy Lover   Editors   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Murders   Obsessive Love   Past Plays a Big Role   Persistent Love Interests   Poor Protagonist   Possessive Characters   R-18   Serial Killers   Stalkers   Tragic Past   Wealthy Characters   Writers
author: 숨나기
description: Shavonne is a poor ghostwriter who lives in a run-down apartment in the streets of the slums. He’s lonely, as he has no family and recently broke up with his partner, now he only has a friend, Dr. Fawkes. One day, strange memos began to stick on the door of Shavonne’s house, where he worried everyday about being able to survive. Before he can uncover the mystery behind them, he encounters a beautiful young man that keeps peeling onions on the staircase next to his unit. After having to listen to the man greeting him every day in every possible language, Shavonne gave him candles so that he could hide the smell of onions. The man invited him to dinner, and it was then when Shavonne discovered a body in the man’s bedroom… Are the serial murders that are causing sensation on Ira Street, the mysterious stalker and the young man who peels onions related?>
